title: Walmart's New Laptop is an INSANE Deal
description: The Motile Walmart "Performance" Laptop is a ridiculously good deal...most of the time. The Motile Ryzen 5 laptop I have here:  Why AMD Ryzen is changing the game in 2020   Check out our new channel @thisis!  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
